snippet: AT&T has clarified the limits of its unlimited data plan. with a Web page that outlines how much of data use might lead to customers being throttled, or having their data connections slowed down.
abstract: AT&T has clarified the limits of its unlimited data plan. with a Web page that outlines how much of data use might lead to customers being throttled, or having their data connections slowed down.

headline.main: AT&T Sets Clearer Limits on 'Unlimited' Plans
